name: GDevelop - Farmalia - Farm & Build GDevelop 5 template
name_original: GDevelop - Farmalia - Farm & Build GDevelop 5 template
description:
Use your mouse to select which tool you want to use.

When you read a sign sometimes a button for building may appear, if you have the enough resources you can build.

Mouse wheel to zoom in/out

Press Z to use an equipped tool.

Press B in game to delete all data and restart.

Press R to restart the scene without loosing anything.

Cheat: Press C to increase the resources.

Debug :Press Enter or Return as you prefer to show debug draw.
